abstract.p: Ab initio molecular dynamics simulations are used to characterize the structural, vibrational, and dynamical properties of water in aqueous magnesium chloride (MgCl 2) solutions, and to develop a methodology to compute the hydration number ( h) of aqueous electrolytes from water reorientation dynamics. The application of this protocol gives h values of MgCl 2 solutions in excellent agreement with experimental hydration numbers obtained using GHz‐to‐THz dielectric relaxation spectroscopy.
